scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run tsc
scripts.generate-mapping: ts-node ./src/presentation/cli-generateMappingClass --src mappingdata.xlsx --output output | npx pino-pretty --ignore pid,hostname --translateTime
scripts.generate-class: ts-node ./src/presentation/cli-generateClass --src classdata.xlsx --output output | npx pino-pretty --levelFirst --singleLine --ignore pid,hostname --translateTime
